sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bǐsài de shèngfù hái hěn nán shuō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le résultat du match est encore difficile à prédire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The outcome of the match is still hard to say.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shícháng xiǎngqǐ gùxiāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il pense souvent à sa ville natale.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He often thinks of his hometown.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他努力学习，因而取得了好成绩。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā nǔlì xuéxí, yīn'ér qǔdé le hǎo chéngjì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a étudié dur, c'est pourquoi il a obtenu de bons résultats.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He studied hard, thus achieving good results.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 巴黎有一座著名的铁塔。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bālí yǒu yī zuò zhùmíng de tiětǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Paris a une célèbre tour en fer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Paris has a famous iron tower.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ huì jìnlì bāngzhù nǐ de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ferai de mon mieux pour t'aider.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I will do my best to help you.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gǎnjǐn zǒu ba, yào chídào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Dépêche-toi, on va être en retard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hurry up, we're going to be late.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎochí ānjìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez rester silencieux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please keep quiet.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 人们的消费观念在改变。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rénmen de xiāofèi guānniàn zài gǎibiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les idées des gens sur la consommation changent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: People's consumption concepts are changing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jiānjué fǎnduì zhège jìhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il s'oppose fermement à ce plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He firmly opposes this plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā ānwèi le bēishāng de háizi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a consolé l'enfant triste.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She comforted the sad child.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jié chēxiāng hěn yōngjǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce wagon est très bondé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This carriage is very crowded.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǔ wàijiè shīqù le liánxì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a perdu le contact avec le monde extérieur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He lost contact with the outside world.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen jiā yòng tiānránqì zuòfàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre famille utilise le gaz naturel pour cuisiner.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our family uses natural gas for cooking.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de jǐngsè tài měi le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le paysage ici est magnifique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The scenery here is so beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 老师解释了这个科学原理。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎoshī jiěshì le zhège kēxué yuánlǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur a expliqué ce principe scientifique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher explained this scientific principle.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 公司的资产在不断增加。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī de zīchǎn zài búduàn zēngjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les actifs de l'entreprise augmentent continuellement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company's assets are constantly increasing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā mòmò de zhùshìzhe chuāngwài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il regarde silencieusement par la fenêtre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He silently gazes out the window.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bìxū chámíng zhēnxiàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons découvrir la vérité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We must find out the truth.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tóurù le dàliàng zīběn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a investi beaucoup de capital.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He invested a large amount of capital.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen jiējìn mùdìdì le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous approchons de la destination.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We are approaching the destination.
